decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers:

23.179.OS (Existing Block Plan); 23.179.100 (Existing Site Plan); 23.179.101 (Existing Ground Floor Plan); 23.179.102 (Existing First Floor Plan); 23.179.103 (Existing Roof Plan); 23.179.104 (Existing Sections); 23.179.105 (Existing Sections); 23.179.106 (Existing Sections); 23.179.106 (Existing Elevation); 23.179.108 (Existing Elevation); 23.179.POS (Proposed Block Plan); 23.179.200 (Proposed Site Plan); 23.179.201 (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); 23.179.202 (Proposed First Floor Plan); 23.179.204 (Proposed Sections); 23.179.205 (Proposed Sections); 23.179.206 (Proposed Sections);; 23.179.208 (Proposed Elevation); Design and Access statement
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| The hereby approved ^IN; rooflights to the roof slope of the hereby development shall be Conservation style rooflights and lie flush with the roof and shall be retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason:  To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, and to safeguard the character and appearance of the conservation area in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and policies 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The development hereby permitted shall be commenced and completed in its entirety and simultaneously.

Reason: In the interests of visual appearance and to ensure the living conditions of the occupiers of each property is protected, in accordance with the National Planning Policy Framework (2023), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013), policy 1.1 (g) of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012) and policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).
description: Single storey rear/side infill extension to 71 and 73 Woodfield Road. (Joint Application)

waste_details.reason_for_no_provision: This is an existing dwelling with limited space
